entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
